snippet.title: Behind The Scenes - Felix The Reaper - About The Game
snippet.description:
Felix The Reaper will release on October 17, 2019!

In this video we take a look behind the scenes at the game's developer, the Danish studio Kong Orange!

Don't forget to wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/919410/Felix_The_Reaper/

Trailer music from one of the bands in the game: http://www.dreamerscircus.com/

-- About The Game --

Felix The Reaper is a romantic comedy about the life of Death. It's brought to you as a 3D shadow manipulation puzzle adventure game of dance, dying people and dangerous love.

Felix The Reaper will be released for Nintendo Switch™ , PlayStation®4, Xbox One, PC and Mac.

https://www.felixthereaper.com/

Follow us at:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FelixTheReaper/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FelixTheReaper 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kong_orange/
Imgur: https://imgur.com/user/ERcreature
